files.title: Overview
files.summary: The matrix multiply and accumulate operations support a limited set of shapes for the operand matrices `A`, `B` and `D`. The shapes of all three matrix operands are collectively described by the tuple *MxNxK* where `A` is *MxK* matrix, `B` is a *KxN* matrix, and `D` is a *MxN* matrix.

files.title: 9.7.16.2.1.1. Target ISA Note
files.summary: * K = 96 is only supported for target architecture `sm_103a`.
